name: Slimformation
tagline: a Chrome extension to help you read smarter
body:
### [Demo](http://slid.es/slimformation/slim-final) ### [Download Alpha](https://github.com/Slimformation/slimformation/blob/master/slimfo.crx?raw=true) To install the extension: - Click the above download link. It will automatically download a file named `slimfo.crx` into your default download folder. - Navigate to [chrome://extensions](chrome://extensions) in Google Chrome - Open your default downloads folder and find the `slimfo.crx` file. - Drag and drop the file into your browser window.
--- **Built By** Basil Huang — [@spicybasil34](http://twitter.com/spicybasil34) Amelia Kaufman — [@ameliakaufman](http://twitter.com/ameliakaufman) Gursimran Singh — [@gnarmis](http://twitter.com/gnarmis) Katie Zhu — [@ktzhu](http://twitter.com/ktzhu)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
